transcript:
And the main thing is," he continued, "that I know, and know for cer- tain, that the enjoyment of doing this good is the only sure happiness in life." 
"Yes, if you put it like that it's quite a dif- ferent matter," said Prince Andrew. "I build a house and lay out a garden, and you build hospitals. The one and the other may serve as a pastime. But what's right and what's good must be judged by one who knows all, but not by us. Well, you want an argument," he added, "come on then."
